Plot: A documentary featuring interviews with all surviving former heads of Shin Bet, the Israeli security agency whose activities and membership are closely held state secrets.
Title: The Gatekeepers
Actors: Ami Ayalon, Avi Dichter, Yuval Diskin, Carmi Gillon
tomatoConsensus: Strikingly stark, brutally honest, and rivetingly assembled, The Gatekeepers offers essential perspective on a seemingly intractable war from some of the men who fought it.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 10 nominations.
